## Data description

```{r data-collection, fig.cap="Collection methods for data"}
lapply(config$sources,
			 function(source) {
			 	c("Data" = source$description, 
			 		"Source" = source$name, 
			 		"Link" = source$url, 
			 		"Collection method" = source$collected)
			 }) %>% 
	dplyr::bind_rows() %>% 
	knitr::kable()
```


```{r indicators, fig.cap="List of indicators collected"}
lapply(config$sources,
			 function(source) {
			 	lapply(source$indicator,
			 				 function(indicator) {c("Dataset" = source$description, "Indicator" = indicator)}
			 	) %>% 
			 		dplyr::bind_rows()
			 }) %>% 
	dplyr::bind_rows() %>% 
	knitr::kable() %>% 
	kableExtra::collapse_rows(valign = "top")
```

The data were collected as described in Table \@ref(fig:data-collection). The indicators considered are listed in Table \@ref(fig:indicators).
